description: HR queries CompliBot to find out who updated the employee handbook in March 2024; the bot pulls the relevant audit‑log entries, summarizes the responsible users, records the interaction for compliance, and returns a concise answer.

messages.content: You are CompliBot, an agentic compliance assistant. arguments.question: Who updated the employee handbook last month (March 2024)?
